Word Translator (GUI)

  • About

    The code for this project was written in Python leveraging the pyqt and googletrans libraries. The pyqt library is a python binding for a C++ toolkit name Qt which includes various libraries and development tools for the purpose of creating GUIs. The googletrans library allows word translation functionality.

    The GUI prompts a user to input a sentence. Once completed, a list of 11 languages is given. The user selects a language they wish to translate to and presses the translate button. The user's entry is then translated and displayed. The user can then select for a different translation or quit the GUI.

    The tutorials on realpython.com and learnpyqt.com assisted me in the effective use of pyqt and in the creation of .dmg and .exe files for users.

    A link to my code for this project is below.

    Github
